name: Gurichless
message: Now that another year has passed, I wonder, what is the one thing that comes to mind when someone says "Pavolia Reine"? I think it is "a good time". You know, whomever you are with, your presence is going to bring laughter and joy. Whether those people are your viewers, or your friends and gen-mates, you're an indispensable part of all of us.Not only because of the joy you bring, but all you bring to the table, including your strong Peafowl work-ethic in everything you do, and your stellar musical talent! (Also your massage skills and your "skibidi rizz") Let this birthday be just another milestone to mark your journey as the CEO of Royaltea, a great friend, and a wonderful entertainer! Happy birthday, Reine!   Much love,  Gurichless
